wikipedia_page.main: Edward Frank Gillett (23 July 1874 – 1 May 1927), often credited as Frank Gillett, was a British artist and illustrator. He worked in pen and ink, pastel, watercolour, and oil. Though he died in 1927, two of his works were in the art competition in the 1928 Summer Olympics.

response: *Edward Frank Gillett – sporting artistGILLETT Edward Frank 1874-1927 at suffolkartists.co.uk, accessed 27 March 2019
*Edward Frank Gillett (1874–1927), British artist and illustrator.
